propositions.text: The document is titled "女录-飞凤女帅".
The main section is about "飞凤女帅".
"飞凤女帅" is identified as a novel.
In the preface, a character questions her attire, stating it's too advanced for the era and perhaps too avant-garde.
Another character reassures her that she looks good in anything and that it's acceptable to enjoy being at the forefront of fashion.
The reassuring character emphasizes his role as her husband and assures her that with him by her side, nothing else matters.

concepts.name: 飞凤女帅

concepts.context: Describes something as avant-garde or too advanced.

concepts.name: 媳妇儿
concepts.context: Term of address used by a husband to his wife.

hierarchy.structure: The document outlines a hierarchical structure: a main title, a primary section title, a classification for that section, a specific part of that section (preface), and then the content within the preface, which itself involves dialogue with levels of reassurance and affirmation.
